name: Ionized Gas Cloud
description: A dense, shimmering nebula that interferes with long-range sensors and communication.

name: Gravity Well
description: A localized distortion in space-time that pulls on nearby vessels. Its origin is unknown.

name: Ship Graveyard
description: The silent remains of a centuries-old space battle. Twisted hulls of massive cruisers drift in the void.

name: Rich Asteroid Field
description: A dense cluster of rocks rich in rare minerals. A beacon for mining corporations.

name: Radiation Storm
description: A violent swirl of high-energy particles that makes transit extremely hazardous.

name: Ghost Signal
description: A repetitive, undecipherable signal originating from a point in deep space. No source is visible.

name: Smuggler's Cache
description: A hidden stash of cargo containers, likely left by a criminal syndicate for later retrieval.

name: Relay Beacon
description: A long-range communication relay that boosts signals across the sector. A critical piece of infrastructure.

name: Ancient Lane Marker
description: A relic from the early days of space exploration, this marker indicates a safe passage through a treacherous asteroid belt. Its origin is a mystery.

name: Refueling Station
description: A small outpost equipped with fuel tanks and basic repair facilities. A common stop for traders and travelers in need of a quick pit stop.

name: Jump-Gate
description: A massive structure that allows for instantaneous travel between two points in space. Its technology is highly advanced and not fully understood. This one appears to be active, with faint energy readings emanating from its core.

name: Jump-Gate
description: A massive structure that allows for instantaneous travel between two points in space. Its technology is highly advanced and not fully understood. This one appears to be dormant, with no signs of recent activity.
